lines.text: You know... you kind of remind me of a bull terrier of some kind.
Yeah, I bet you say that to all the girls.
Now look. There is nothing in the world to get uptight about. We are two summa cum laudes. We can handle one little baby for eight hours.

[to an executive]
This is Elizabeth. J.C. is taking care of her for a while.
Well, Fritz, I'm actually keeping her a little longer than that.
... And your sister's name in Wiesbaden - in case of an emergency - and her prison record if *any.*
Uh, oh, silly! I mean her *address* if you *have* it.

[crying in Dr. Cooper's office]
Sex? I can't even say the word... not that I was ever really into it, but... when you don't have any and there are no prospects, well, it's very upsetting!
I think you should know from the start that I am a full-charged nanny. I don't argue and I do not like to be argued with.
If it wasn't for me, you'd be selling shirts at Barney's, you little pisher!
